sentences.en: A: Why do we have to do durability test?
sentences.cn: 我们为什么要做耐久性测试?

sentences.en: Airlines recommend hard-sided cases for durability.
sentences.cn: 航空公司推荐使用硬边箱，因其经久耐用。

sentences.en: Another problem of cigarettes as money is their lack of durability.
sentences.cn: 香烟作为货币的另一个问题是它缺少耐久性。

sentences.en: Because of the durability of vinyl, products made from this material have a long life span.
sentences.cn: 由于「乙烯基」的耐久性，这种材料制成的产品具有很长的寿命。

sentences.en: Chamber compatibility and injector durability involve the control of the combustion environment.
sentences.cn: 室相容性和喷注器耐久性包括对燃烧环境的控制.

sentences.en: Concrete and reinforcement bar corrosion reduced the reinforced concretes durability.
sentences.cn: 砼碳化及钢筋锈蚀导致钢筋砼构件耐久性能降低.

sentences.en: Corrosion and aging resistance, simple - operating, stable function, safety and long durability.
sentences.cn: 抗腐蚀、耐老化 、 操作简便, 性能稳定, 安全可靠,使用寿命长.

sentences.en: Dal í uses logging to implement atomicity and durability of transactions.
sentences.cn: DALI使用日志实现原子性和持久性.

sentences.en: Durability of soft mouse surfaces are always a tough question.

sentences.en: Sulfate attack is one of the most important problems on concrete durability.

sentences.en: The company refined types of printing products, durability, security capacity - period.

sentences.en: The German cameras are chiefly characterized by their fine workmanship and durability.
sentences.cn: 德国相机的主要特点是工艺精湛,经久耐用.

sentences.en: The result indicates that concrete protective coating can largely enhance concrete durability.
sentences.cn: 结果表明,此种防护涂层可以很好地提高混凝土的耐久性.

sentences.en: These plastic surface has a anti - moisture , heat - resistant and long term durability.
sentences.cn: 这些塑料暗不天具有 抗水 、 耐寒、恒久耐用的特不面.

sentences.en: They estimate that they will need between five and ten years to commercialize their technology because uncertainties remain regarding the durability of organic cells.
sentences.cn: 他们估计要用五到十年的时间使他们的技术商业化，因为关于这种有机电池的耐久性还不确定。

sentences.en: They excel for their workship, color, design and durability.
sentences.cn: 他们以它的手工 、 颜色 、 设计和耐用性著称.

sentences.cn: 这个产品的特点是工艺精湛,经久耐用.
